Title: Pure-tou no Nakama-tachi
Description: ['Kona is a boy who has a friend: a pink dragon named Serendipity with a kind nature. They want to stop the evil captain who tries steal gold from their peaceful island. ']
Staff: [['Terada, Kenji', 'Script'], ['Matsuyama, Yuushi', 'Theme Song Arrangement'], ['Gotou, Takayuki', 'Key Animation'], ['Yonekawa, Koushin', 'Key Animation']]
